channel.title: Comments on: 103769 vacancies in Level 1 of 7th CPC Pay Matrix through Railway Recruitment Board (RRB)

item.title: By: Rabin14
item.dc:creator: Rabin14
item.description:
In reply to <a href="httphttps://rabin14.github.io/wordpress//103769-vacancies-in-level-1-of-7th-cpc-pay-matrix-through-railway-recruitment-board-rrb/#comment-5">Gamble goutham</a>.
Exact Date, Time and Venue for examination/interview will be intimated to the eligible candidates in due course as well as such information will be also available in the official website of respective Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) — http://www.rrcb.gov.in/rrbs.html
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gamble goutham.

Exact Date, Time and Venue for examination/interview will be intimated to the eligible candidates in due course as well as such information will be also available in the official website of respective Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) — http://www.rrcb.gov.in/rrbs.html
